data.prayer: Father, answer the requests of your people in the state of Copán.
data.verse: This is the boldness which we have toward him, that, if we ask anything according to his will, he listens to us.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Copán, Honduras

data.prayer: Holy Spirit, have mercy on the simple who turned from you in the state of Copán. Warn them again against their complacency.
data.verse: For the simple are killed by their turning away, and the complacency of fools destroys them;

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 3 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, call those who are far off in Copán, Honduras, so that they and their family can receive life.
data.verse: For the promise is to you, and to your children, and to all who are far off, even as many as the Lord our God will call to himself.

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 413,000 citizens of Copán, Honduras, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Turk people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Father, please send teachers of your Word in Copán who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Copán, Honduras.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Father, look after and teach the way that is best for the 113,475 believers living in Copán, Honduras.
data.verse: I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go. I will counsel you with my loving eye on you.

location.name: Copán
location.cities_list: Santa Rosa de Copán, La Entrada, Copán Ruinas, Florida, Corquín
location.cities_list_w_pop: Santa Rosa de Copán (27,753), La Entrada (14,705), Copán Ruinas (6,336), Florida (5,340), Corquín (4,752)
